abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev has a target of $1.4 billion in annual cost savings by the end of the fourth year following completion of the deal.
snippet: Anheuser-Busch InBev has a target of $1.4 billion in annual cost savings by the end of the fourth year following completion of the deal.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Anheuser-Busch InBev said on Friday that it expected to eliminate at least 3 percent of its combined work force as part of cost-cutting efforts following its proposed merger with SABMiller over the next several years.

headline.main: Anheuser-Busch InBev to Cut Jobs After SABMiller Merger
